mean_en: a number of people or things that have been chosen from a larger group; a collection of things from which something can be chosen
sentence: Our nursery offers a selection of spring flowers of many different colors.
sentence_trans: 我们的苗圃里有各种颜色的春季花卉可供挑选。
word_etyma: se分开 + lect选择，收集 → select分开选=选择 + ion表名词 → 选择
